Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary; translations
_description: A hymn to the Virgin Mary translating: ‘Virgo singularis respice quod quero’, etc. — in quatrains

BLEge3245.Transcription: Mayde wiþoute makeBe held þow qwat I crauebe þe lode sterre in lakeHope of grace ich haueOf helpe þow art ȝateIn þe I me spedeOf ȝunk[ ]e þat me is late…
BLEge3245.Note: Incomplete due to damage to leaf; first words of six further lines also survive on f. 199.
BLEge3245.Attributed Title: Virgo singularis respice quod quero parte stella maris gracie spem gero
BLEge3245.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “The Gurney Series of Religious Lyrics.” 
             PMLA
         54 (1939): 369-90: 386.
